subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michele Redman and Sweden’s Maria Hjorth shot six-under 66s to share the first-round lead in the L.P.G.A.’s Longs Drugs Challenge in Danville, Calif.
snippet: Michele Redman and Sweden’s Maria Hjorth shot six-under 66s to share the first-round lead in the L.P.G.A.’s Longs Drugs Challenge in Danville, Calif.
